attributes.action: Stop the new plans to deny students who fail Maths or English GCSE’s a loan
attributes.additional_details: It will prevent students from accessing higher education as there will be major financial issues. There are huge shortages in job roles and by withholding loans there will be less people qualifying to fill the roles.
attributes.background: I want the Government to rethink the plan to deny loans to students who fail certain GCSE’s as it will prevent a large number of students from starting university.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609369
